title: Judge drops case against Va. man branded ms-13 leader by Trump admin
shortDescription: Top Trump administration officials touted his arrest, calling him a top MS-13 leader. They dropped the case but still seek to remove him.

title: Trump admin asks Supreme Court to let DOGE access Social Security data
shortDescription: A federal judge blocked DOGE access to data of millions of Americans after she found the Social Security Administration likely violated privacy law.

title: Trump administration agrees to settlement over killed Jan. 6 rioter
shortDescription: Lawyers for the Trump administration and the family of slain Jan. 6 rioter Ashli Babbitt said they have reached a settlement over her death.

title: White House planning Trump, Army parade
shortDescription: The White House is planning a massive military parade to celebrate the Army's 250th anniversary and President Donald Trump's 79th birthday.

title: Ketanji Brown Jackson: Trump's judge attacks 'designed to intimidate'
shortDescription: Supreme Court Justice Ketanji Brown Jackson did not mention Trump by name during remarks in Puerto Rico but spoke about 'the elephant in the room'

title: NASA's SLS moon rocket on chopping block in Trump's budget proposal
shortDescription: A budget proposal released on May 2 includes not only cuts to NASA's science budget, but an early end to its SLS moon rocket.

title: What to know about some Democrats' push in Congress to impeach Trump
shortDescription: Trump on Thursday said Republicans in Congress “should start to think” about expelling Democrats who are pushing impeachment efforts against him.

title: Army moving forward with plans for Trump birthday parade: report
shortDescription: A new report by the Associated Press indicates that a potential birthday parade for President Donald Trump would feature 6,600 soldiers.

title: Thousands rally against Trump, Musk in May Day protests | The Excerpt
shortDescription: President Donald Trump's shakeup of his national security team. | Judge rules Trump cannot use the Alien Enemies Act to deport Venezuelan migrants.

title: Canadian PM Carney says he will meet Trump in DC next Tuesday
shortDescription: Canadian Prime Minister Mark Carney's Liberal Party had trailed badly in the polls as recently as January but rebounded to win this week's election.

title: Harvard responds to Trump threats
shortDescription: The Trump administration has threatened to freeze $2 billion in federal funding after not agreeing to a list of demands from the administration.

title: Armored vehicles and 7,000 troops: A look at plans for Trump's birthday parade
shortDescription: The Army’s plans for a massive parade on June 14 – President Donald Trump’s 79th birthday – include armored vehicles and nearly 7,000 troops.

title: ¿Aprueban los latinos a Trump tras 100 días? Lo que dicen las encuestas
shortDescription: Por qué los latinos están perdiendo confianza en Trump según las últimas encuestas nacionales. Lo que tienes que saber.

title: Trump to celebrate 78th birthday
shortDescription: Former President Donald Trump will celebrate his 78th birthday on Friday with a ticketed event for his "Cub 47" fan club in Florida.

title: Trump says he's revoking Harvard's tax-exempt status
shortDescription: President Donald Trump said he's taking action to remove the tax-exempt status of Harvard University, escalating his fight with the school.

title: Trump order aims to cut PBS and NPR funding
shortDescription: President Donald Trump signed an executive order to stop directly funding PBS and NPR.

title: Trump looks to cut $163 billion in new budget proposal: What to know
shortDescription: Trump released a budget proposal outlining $163 billion in spending cuts that mirrored recommendations from Elon Musk and DOGE.

title: Trump wants to rename Veterans Day: Here's what he wants to call it
shortDescription: Here's why President Trump is pushing to rename Veterans Day, a federal holiday recognized each year on Nov. 11.

title: Trump signs executive order that aims to cut funding for PBS and NPR
shortDescription: The order instructs the Corporation for Public Broadcasting, which distributes funding to PBS and NPR stations, to "cease direct funding" to them.

title: Birthday bash: President Trump and Army plan June 14 parade
shortDescription: Plans for the parade include 6,000 soldiers, helicopters and armored vehicles, such as Strykers, Bradley Fighting Vehicles and possibly Abrams tanks.
